author: techbro_ccoli
content: Anyone have a quick script to deserialize the invalid blocks?

author: tersec
content: Nimbus's version is `ncli` (https://github.com/status-im/nimbus-eth2/tree/stable/ncli), which covers the same general functionality as https://github.com/protolambda/zcli
